h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - First Prince of Flowing Sands
content: The First Prince will usually start with a lunging two-hand slam attack after he stands on his hind legs that shakes up a lot of dust, but you can dodge to the side and keep attacking as he recovers.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley of Despair' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - First Prince of Flowing Sands'.
The content is as follows:
The First Prince will usually start with a lunging two-hand slam attack after he stands on his hind legs that shakes up a lot of dust, but you can dodge to the side and keep attacking as he recovers.
